Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 293-1 Filed 05/25/21 Page 344 of 349

By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.

R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY

Dated: 10/30/07
By: Jeffrey Epstein FAUSA
A. MARIE VILLAFANA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY

JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Gerald Lefcourt

COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN

Dated: ___________
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN

DOJ-OGR-00004641

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a signed addendum to a Non-Prosecution Agreement. The signatures are present, and the dates are handwritten. The document is related to the case of Jeffrey Epstein.
